markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Homeward Bound](/Feats.aspx?ID=4437) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 53 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
twice per week

</column>

---

The connection between you and the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10) resonates within your body stronger than it does for most gnomes, allowing you to cross the threshold between [the Universe](/Planes.aspx?ID=1) and the First World. You gain [_interplanar teleport_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1576) as a primal innate spell. You can cast it twice per week. This can be used only to travel back and forth between the First World and the Universe. Due to your body's natural resonance, you can act as a locus for the spell, and you don't require a specially attuned planar key.
name: Homeward Bound
